Get Free Access toCar Cabin Noise Reports

Enjoy peace and quiet on the road. Select a car, see cabin noise levels, find your perfect ride.

Find out cabin noise levels of top consumer cars now.

Start

How it works

  • Create a shortlist
    Use four simple filters to select your best options.
  • Prioritise them
    Drag-drop options and prioritise them according to your needs.
  • You have a winner!
    Congratulations, you’ve now found your perfect car.

Quick Facts

30 dB
Causes missed fine detail when listening to your favourite music.
40 dB
May become difficult for driver to hear a child’s voice from the rear seats.
50 dB
Driver needs to speak up to be heard by companion in front passenger seat.
60 dB
Additional tiredness can begin to affect all passengers.
70 dB
When will the journey end???
